plot: The Smurfs, tiny blue people living in a village of big forest mushrooms, have assorted adventures in this theatrical compilation of five "Smurfs" TV cartoon shorts adapted from Peyo's famous comic-book.
title: Les aventures des Schtroumpfs
plot_es: The Smurfs, tiny blue people living in a village of big forest mushrooms, have assorted adventures in this theatrical compilation of five "Smurfs" TV cartoon shorts adapted from Peyo's famous comic-book.
plot_en: The Smurfs, tiny blue people living in a village of big forest mushrooms, have assorted adventures in this theatrical compilation of five "Smurfs" TV cartoon shorts adapted from Peyo's famous comic-book.
